topic: Self-reflection techniques for professionals in the solar and energy sectors
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that there are areas of my life and beliefs that I may be unconsciously avoiding due to discomfort or fear, and these areas hold potential for significant personal growth. As a next step, I will set aside time to journal or meditate on questions such as, "What am I afraid to question in my life and why?" and "What long-held beliefs might no longer serve me?" This will help bring these overlooked areas to the forefront for reflection and action.

metadata.trigger: What's a question I haven't asked myself in a while?
